Title: Rio Olympics: India's schedule on August 18,2016
Content: On Day 13 of the Rio Games, shuttler P.V. Sindhu will take on Japan’s Nozomi Okuhara for a place in the final. Wrestler Babita Kumari will begin her campaign in the women's freestyle 53 kg. Badmin
Author: Internet Desk
Description: On Day 13 of the Rio Games, shuttler P.V. Sindhu will take on Japan’s Nozomi Okuhara for a place in the final. Wrestler Babita Kumari will begin her campaign in the women's freestyle 53 kg. Badmin
